verses.verse: <S%G2547>And<s%> he <S%G450>arose<s%> from <S%G2547>thence<s%>, and <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the farther <S%G4008>side<s%> of <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4848>resort<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> he was <S%G1486>wont<s%>, he <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> came to <S%G4334>him<s%>, and <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, Is <S%G1487>it<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G435>man<s%> to put <S%G630>away<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%>? <S%G3985>tempting<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> did <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1781>command<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>?
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2010>suffered<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> a <S%G975>bill<s%> of <S%G647>divorcement<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to put her <S%G630>away<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4314>For<s%> the <S%G4641>hardness<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4641>heart<s%> he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1785>precept<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G730>male<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2338>female<s%>.

For this <S%G1752>cause<s%> <S%G5127><s%> <S%G2641>shall<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4347>cleave<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1417>twain<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>one<s%> <S%G3391><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>: so <S%G5620>then<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1417>twain<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>.
<S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath joined <S%G4801>together<s%>, <S%G5563>let<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> put <S%G5563>asunder<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> matter.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3739>Whosoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall put <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1060>marry<s%> <S%G243>another<s%>, committeth <S%G3429>adultery<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> shall put <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G435>husband<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1060>married<s%> to <S%G243>another<s%>, she committeth <S%G3429>adultery<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> young <S%G3813>children<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> those that <S%G4374>brought<s%> them.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, he was much <S%G23>displeased<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G863>Suffer<s%> the little <S%G3813>children<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2967>forbid<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> of <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3739>Whosoever<s%> <S%G1209>shall<s%> <S%G3362>not<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a little <S%G3813>child<s%>, he <S%G1525>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1723>took<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> up in his <S%G1723>arms<s%>, <S%G5087>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he was gone <S%G1607>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G846>way<s%> <S%G3598><s%>, there <S%G4370>came<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4370>running<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1120>kneeled<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G18>Good<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5101>Why<s%> callest <S%G3004>thou<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>? there is <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>, that is, <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Thou <S%G1492>knowest<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%>, <S%G3431>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, <S%G5407>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5407>kill<s%>, <S%G2813>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%>, <S%G5576>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> bear false <S%G5576>witness<s%>, <S%G650>Defraud<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G5091>Honour<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> have I <S%G5442>observed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3503>youth<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>beholding<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, One <S%G1520>thing<s%> <S%G4671>thou<s%> <S%G5302>lackest<s%>: go thy <S%G5217>way<s%>, <S%G4453>sell<s%> <S%G3745>whatsoever<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1204>come<s%>, take <S%G142>up<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%>, and <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he was <S%G4768>sad<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> that <S%G3056>saying<s%>, and went <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>grieved<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G2933>possessions<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> looked round <S%G4017>about<s%>, and <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1423>hardly<s%> shall they that <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5536>riches<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>!

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2284>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answereth<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, and <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5043>Children<s%>, <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1422>hard<s%> is <S%G2076>it<s%> for them that <S%G3982>trust<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5536>riches<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>!

It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2123>easier<s%> for a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to <S%G1525>go<s%> <S%G1330><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5168>eye<s%> of a <S%G4476>needle<s%>, <S%G2228>than<s%> for a rich <S%G4145>man<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> out of <S%G4057>measure<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> then <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved<s%>?

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2400>Lo<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, There <S%G2076>is<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> hath <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G79>sisters<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G68>lands<s%>, for <S%G1700>my<s%> <S%G1752>sake<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel's<s%>,

<S%G3362>But<s%> he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> an <S%G1542>hundredfold<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>, <S%G3614>houses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G79>sisters<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mothers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G68>lands<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G165>world<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that are <S%G4413>first<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> going <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2258>went<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G2284>amazed<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> as they <S%G190>followed<s%>, they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%>, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> what things <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G4819>happen<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>,

<S%G3754>Saying,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, we go <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto the chief <S%G749>priests<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> unto the <S%G1122>scribes<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G2632>condemn<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> they shall <S%G1702>mock<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G3146>scourge<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall spit <S%G1716>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he shall rise <S%G450>again<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G4365>come<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, we <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%G4160>do<s%> for <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3739>whatsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> we shall <S%G154>desire<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> ye that <S%G3165>I<s%> should <S%G4160>do<s%> for <S%G5213>you<s%>?

<S%G1161><s%> They <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1325>Grant<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G2523>sit<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> left <S%G2176>hand<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> ye <S%G154>ask<s%>: can <S%G1410>ye<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> drink <S%G4095>of<s%>? <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am baptized <S%G907>with<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, We <S%G1410>can<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Ye <S%G4095>shall<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> drink <S%G4095>of<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am baptized <S%G907>withal<s%> shall ye be <S%G907>baptized<s%>:
